name: The treasure of the lost temple
name_original: The treasure of the lost temple
description:
Eratos is an adventurer searching for a treasure buried in a temple, he needs help to discover it. Will you be able to brave the obstacles to obtain this treasure ?
This mini-game in the way RPG 2D is a game based on obstacle courses and enigmas.
The scenario of the game is simple but some enigmas and obstacles will make you lose your mind.
